title: #57 - That Episode Where We Introduce The Ask a Matchmaker Hotline
description:
It’s been an amazing year on the podcast! Thank you so much for listening and thank you for your support!

This fall, we’ll be starting season 2. And with season 2, we’re starting something new… The Ask a Matchmaker Hotline! You will be able to call in and ask Maria about anything! On the spot advice just for you! Those calls will be on upcoming episodes.

This week, we’re giving you a sneak peek into the hotline with two listeners calling into the Ask a Matchmaker hotline. 

Take a listen!

Enroll in the next Agape Intensive: https://agapematch.com/agape-group-coaching-intensive/ 

Follow Maria on Instagram Follow Maria on TikTok Have a question for Maria? Visit http://askamatchmaker.com
author: maria@agapematch.com (Maria Avgitidis)
